methods.apply:
Apply this function to the input chunk, returning an output chunk.

 The result is owned by this ToIntFunctor.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Chunk<? extendsIntToIntegerCastWithOffset.T>) - the chunk to transform
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.IntChunk<? extends IntToIntegerCastWithOffset.T>) the result IntChunk

text: Cast the values in the input chunk to an int and add the specified offset.
